name: Tumble Transport
description:
Load up cargo trucks and improvise fastening by getting creative uses out of tape, glue and spanning lashing straps.

Story & Gameplay

Genre: Action

The year is 2018 and you are looking for a side job to help make ends meet and pay for classes.

Somehow you found yourself in the loading deck of "Tumble Transports Inc.". The manager didn't really look at your resume. They just seemed happy to have you. Rumors are the last guy left in a hurry.

Now it's your job to load up trucks with all sorts of cargo. Use the tools provided by your boss and fasten your seatbelts. Or lashing straps? Or maybe even these bootstraps?

Whatever you fasten, just make sure none of that cargo goes flying off in all directions!

Controls

This game uses only the mouse.

Use the left mouse button to drag & drop the cargo onto the trucks.

Right click to rotate.

Drag & drop tools (glue, tape, straps) and replace them by dropping them in the dumpster.

Click the "dispatch" button to signal the driver to leave.

Tutorial

This game features a fully interactive in-game tutorial.

Credits

Created by Adrian Herbers, Patrick Herbers, and Patrick Quiskamp.

Programming by: NF, PH, PQ

Design: NF, AH, PH, PQ

Art: AH, PH

Sounds: PH, PQ

Music: PH

All other audio selfmade or by freesound.org
